This table highlights the biggest debates in the ESG spheres within your portfolio. We only show the most relevant news where:

* Positive: where sentiment score > 25%
* Negative: where sentiment score > -35% 
* Topic_main: where topic score > 25%.
* Topic_sub: where sub-topic score > 25%.

To search for specific topics (eg. Russia) within the news table, you can use our keyword search feature.
